word_mean: 化学吸附〔作用〕：一种物质被另一种物质化学吸附，导致一种不同的化合物产生

sentence.Network_en: Its common useis in conjunction with selective gas chemisorption for verification of metal surface area.

sentence.Network_en: A direct dissociative chemisorption process was found.
sentence.Network_cn: 并且发现一直接分解化学吸附过程.
